sentences.sContent: Effect on the controlling oriental tobacco budworm , Helicoverpa assulta by using sex pheromone.
sentences.sContent_eng: Effect on the controlling oriental tobacco budworm , Helicoverpa assulta by using sex pheromone.
sentences.sCn: 与用性信息素诱剂防治烟青虫的效果>>相似的文献。

sentences.sContent: And when neighboring fruits sense this pheromone, they ripen faster, so that all fruits mature at the same time.
sentences.sContent_eng: And when neighboring fruits sense this pheromone, they ripen faster, so that all fruits mature at the same time.
sentences.sCn: 当周围植物感测到这种信息素时，它们会更快成熟，而所有的水果就能同时成熟了。

sentences.sContent: Honeybee is polyandry and eusocial-insect that they produce by colony fission and swarming who communicate with dancing and pheromone.
sentences.sContent_eng: Honeybee is polyandry and eusocial-insect that they produce by colony fission and swarming who communicate with dancing and pheromone.
sentences.sCn: 蜜蜂是多雄性真社会性昆虫，分蜂是这个庞大家族繁衍的重要手段，它们通过信息素和蜂舞来传递信息。

trans.tranOther: a chemical that is produced by people’s and animals’ bodies and is thought to influence the behaviour of other people or animals
